title: Can't create video clip of audio recording using Recorder app on Pixel 3a
content:
I tried following the directions I copy/pasted at the bottom of this post. However, my phone doesn't give me the option for step 5. I can select the content/layout/theme, but there's no Create button at the top right. Only the option to 'x' out of the selection. Is it because it is sound only without words (I'm recording the sound of cicadas)? I have another recording where the option to share as a video file is there. Just this one recording doesn't allow me the option.
Thanks!

Share or save audio as a video file
From the recording, you can create a video clip up to 60 seconds.
On your Pixel, open Recorder .
Touch and hold a recording.
At the top right, tap Share   Video clip.
Then, if you want, customize the video's content, layout, and theme.
Content: Select Transcript & waveform or Waveform.
Layout: Select Square, Portrait, or Landscape.
Theme: Select Dark theme or Light theme.
At the top right, tap Create.
Tap Save or Share. If you choose to share the clip, select the app to share to.
If you don't want to save or share, at the top right, tap Done.
